short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds query string to URL to set Action Order to Ascending - use case for JIRA have Oldest First as standard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds query string (actionsOrder=asc) to URL to set Action Order to Ascending for JIRA Issue (Single-)View.

Open Options to set your JIRA url (eg jira.company.com).
Works as soon filter in Options is set. (you can set it to "google.com" for functionality test on that site)
